caption: Figure 5: Attention Ratio Statistic. We analyze the attention ratios distribution for different image counts across various data types, and use dashed lines to indicate the thresholds for each data set.
description: The chart displays the distribution of attention ratios for different numbers of images across three data types (Sequence, Grid Collage, and Pic-in-Pic), showing how the attention focus changes with the number of images and data type.
